name: My Guardian
description:
This is my first game! And its for a game... so you can imagine how that went... 2am, school tomorrow... Life is great!

I hope you enjoy my petty excuse for a game, and I realized a bit too  late that the last quit button doesn't work... I'm sorry! But I'm really new to this and I'm slightly proud at how it turned out, you simply run, jump and crash, like any platformer but with a tad of lore in it... ouuu.
